author: L M
title: Novotel London Tower Bridge
text: Hotel located next to Towern in a more business focused area of London (many shops/restaurants not open on evenings/weekends). Good communications both train and tube station close (Tower Hill tube station and Fenchurch Street train station). Clean and modern hotel with helpful staff. Breakfast good but lacks the little extras.
